alert.note: Alert for Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 4:41AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Monterey County through 515 AM PST... At 440 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Andrew Molera State Park, or near Big Sur Village, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Sur Village, Andrew Molera State Park, Cachagua Near The Los Padres Dam and Pico Blanco Campground. This includes Highway 1 between Mile Markers 47 and 54, and near Mile Marker 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
